005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * Supports a data value which may be multiple lines of markup.
016 * <p>
017 * This markup can be presented as XHTML or Markdown.
018 */
019public class MarkupMultiline
020    extends AbstractMarkupString<MarkupMultiline> {
021
022  @NonNull
023  private static final FlexmarkFactory FLEXMARK_FACTORY = FlexmarkFactory.instance();
024
025  /**
026   * Convert the provided HTML string into markup.
027   *
028   * @param html
029   *          the HTML
030   * @return the markup instance
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  public static MarkupMultiline fromHtml(@NonNull String html) {
034    return new MarkupMultiline(
035        parseHtml(
036            html,
037            FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getFlexmarkHtmlConverter(),
038            FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Convert the provided markdown string into markup.
043   *
044   * @param markdown
045   *          the markup
046   * @return the markup instance
047   */
048  @NonNull
049  public static MarkupMultiline fromMarkdown(@NonNull String markdown) {
050    return new MarkupMultiline(
051        parseMarkdown(markdown, FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Construct a new multiline markup instance.
056   *
057   * @param astNode
058   *          the parsed markup AST
059   */
060  public MarkupMultiline(@NonNull Document astNode) {
061    super(astNode);
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public FlexmarkFactory getFlexmarkFactory() {
066    return FLEXMARK_FACTORY;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public MarkupMultiline copy() {
071    // TODO: find a way to do a deep copy
072    // this is a shallow copy that uses the same underlying Document object
073    return new MarkupMultiline(getDocument());
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public boolean isBlock() {
078    return true;
079  }
080}
